products.name: SATLUJ
products.description: Satluj is a high-purity micronutrient fertilizer with 19% Ferrous Sulphate (Fe), specially formulated to address iron deficiencies in crops. Its dry and moisture-resistant nature ensures long shelf life and effective absorption.
products.Best Used In: Wheat, Paddy, Maize, Barley, Gram, Lentil, Moong, Urd, Mustard, Groundnut, Soybean, Sunflower, Potato, Tomato, Brinjal, Okra, Cabbage, Cauliflower, Onion, Garlic, Peas, Citrus, Pomegranate, Banana, Grapes, Apple, Guava, Papaya, Cotton, Sugarcane, Tea, Coffee, Flowers, Medicinal Plants, Aromatic Plants, Turf, Lawns
products.Defends Against: Iron deficiency in plants; enhances chlorophyll formation and plant vigor

products.name: BLACK HORSE
products.description: Black Horse combines organic fertilizers with essential minerals to enrich soil fertility, improve plant immunity, and support vigorous root and shoot growth. It is 100% eco-friendly and enhances both yield and quality.
products.Best Used In: Wheat, Paddy, Maize, Barley, Gram, Lentil, Soybean, Mustard, Groundnut, Cotton, Sugarcane, Potato, Tomato, Brinjal, Chili, Okra, Onion, Garlic, Cabbage, Cauliflower, Peas, Apple, Grapes, Pomegranate, Mango, Guava, Papaya, Citrus, Strawberry, Tea, Coffee, Flowers, Medicinal Plants
products.Defends Against: Abiotic stress like drought, salinity, and temperature fluctuations; strengthens immunity and soil health

products.name: ROOT RAJA
products.description: Root Raja is a granular fertilizer based on mycorrhiza that enhances nutrient absorption, promotes drought resistance, and supports sustainable plant growth by improving soil microbial activity.
products.Best Used In: Grapes, Wheat, Okra, Cotton, Guava, Tea, Tomato, Medicinal Plants, Onion, Paddy, Apple, Banana, Barley, Brinjal, Flowers, Sugarcane, Strawberry, Ginger, Papaya, Sugarbeet, Cabbage, Cauliflower, Sorghum, Capsicum, Coffee, Citrus, Oil Seeds, Maize, Lentil, Gram, Peas, Mung, Pomegranate, Beans
products.Defends Against: Nutrient deficiency, poor soil health, and drought stress

products.name: DUMBELL
products.description: A broad-spectrum fungicide combining Azoxystrobin and Difenoconazole, Dumbell is effective in controlling various fungal diseases. It works systemically to provide preventive and curative action, ensuring crop protection during critical growth stages.
products.Best Used In: Paddy, Tomato, Chilli, Wheat, Mango, Pea
products.Defends Against: Leaf spots, Blights, Powdery mildew, Rusts, Downy mildew, Anthracnose, Early and late blight

products.name: SPEXS
products.description: Spexs is a potent fungicide blend of Azoxystrobin and Tebuconazole offering strong systemic and translaminar action. It protects crops against a wide range of fungal infections, improving plant health and yield quality.
products.Best Used In: Onion, Rice, Wheat, Potato, Chilli, Tomato
products.Defends Against: Yellow Rust, Sheath Blight, Early Blight, Late Blight, Anthracnose, Alternaria Leaf Spot, Scab (in apples), Downy Mildew, Powdery Mildew, Fruit Rot, Die Back

products.name: SAFAR
products.description: SAFAR is a powerful combination fungicide containing Tebuconazole and Captan that provides comprehensive protection against a wide spectrum of fungal diseases. Its dual-action formula delivers both preventive and curative benefits for various crops.
products.Best Used In: Paddy, Apple, Banana, Chili, Coffee, Corn, Grape, Mango, Mustard, Okra, Onion, Pea, Sugarcane, Tomato, Wheat
products.Defends Against: Scab, powdery mildew, Rust, Smut, Leaf spot, Blotch, Sugarcane red rot, Tea blight, Sheath blight, White rust, Die-back, Anthracnose, Black rot, Brown Spot, White spot, etc.

products.name: FOX
products.description: FOX is a granular insecticide containing Fipronil, designed to effectively manage major pests in paddy, wheat, and sugarcane crops. It provides long-lasting protection against damaging insects by acting through contact and ingestion.
products.Defends Against: Stem Borer, Leaf folder, Twemite, Early Shoot Borer

products.name: SOMA
products.description: SOMA is a granular formulation of Cartap Hydrochloride that acts systemically and through ingestion, providing targeted control of leaf folders, stem borers, and whorl maggots in paddy. It is effective during early crop stages.
products.Defends Against: Leaf folder, Stem borer, Whorl maggot

products.name: EXAM-PRO
products.description: EXAM-PRO is a seed treatment and foliar insecticide formulated with Thiamethoxam. It offers systemic protection against a wide spectrum of sucking and soil-borne pests. Ideal for early-stage protection across multiple crops.
products.Best Used In: Paddy, Wheat, Cotton, Vegetables, Maize, Sunflower
products.Defends Against: Aphids, Whiteflies, Jassids, Shoot Fly, Termites, Thrips, Stem Fly
products.Dose/Acre: Seed Treatment: 1.5 – 4 ml/kg seed; Foliar Spray: 100 ml/acre

products.name: BLENDER
products.description: BLENDER is a contact insecticide formulated with Bifenthrin, providing fast and effective control of a wide range of pests including termites, beetles, aphids, and more. It is versatile across cereals and vegetable crops.
products.Best Used In: Paddy, Cotton, Sugarcane, Corn, Some Vegetables
products.Defends Against: Ants, Termites, Aphids, Beetles, Cockroaches, Spiders

products.name: BRAND-G
products.description: BRAND-G is a versatile insecticide containing Chlorantraniliprole that effectively controls a wide range of pests across numerous crop types. It provides excellent protection against various borers, caterpillars, and other destructive insects.
products.Best Used In: Sugarcane, Soybean, Maize, Groundnut, Cotton, Rice, Pigeon Pea, Black Gram, Bengal Gram, Alfalfa, Brassicas, Corn, Tomatoes, Chili, Brinjal, Cabbage, Bitter Gourd, Okra, Peppers, Leafy Greens, Grapes, Citrus, Pome Fruits, Avocados, Litchis, Pomegranates, Stone Fruits (Peaches, Plums, Nectarines), Tree Nuts
products.Defends Against: Stem borer, Leaf folder, American bollworm, Spotted bollworm, Diamond back moth, Termite, Early Shoot Borer, Top Borer, Fruit Borer, Shoot & Fruit Borer, Pod Borer, Green Semilooper, Stem Fly, Girdle Beetle, Caterpillars
products.Dose/Acre: 20ml to 250 ml / acre, depending on the crop type and growth stage

products.name: LEGAND
products.description: LEGAND is a dual-action insecticide combining Thiamethoxam and Lambda-cyhalothrin, providing comprehensive protection against various crop pests. It offers both systemic and contact action for effective pest management.
products.Best Used In: Maize, Cotton, Groundnut, Soybean, Chili, Tea, and Tomato
products.Defends Against: Yellow Rust, Sheath Blight, Early Blight, Late Blight, Anthracnose, Alternaria Leaf Spot, Scab (in apples), Downy Mildew, Powdery Mildew, Fruit Rot, Die Back
products.Dose/Acre: 50 ml to 80 ml per acre, depending on the crop type and disease severity

products.name: HIMALAYA 505
products.description: HIMALAYA 505 is a powerful combination insecticide containing Chlorpyrifos and Cypermethrin that delivers broad-spectrum pest control. It is especially effective against sucking pests and borers in various crops.
products.Best Used In: Cotton, Paddy, Vegetables, Soyabean, Chickpeas, Pigeon Pea
products.Defends Against: Aphids, Jassids, Thrips, Whiteflies, Bollworms, and Stem borers
products.Dose/Acre: 500ml - 1ltr per acre, depending on the specific crop and pest infestation level

products.name: AJANTA
products.description: AJANTA is a premium insecticide formulation combining Chlorantraniliprole and Lambda Cyhalothrin, designed to combat a variety of destructive pests. It provides extended protection for multiple crop types through both systemic and contact action.
products.Best Used In: Grapes, Pomegranate, Cotton, Paddy, Tomato, Brinjal, Okra, Chili & Soyabean
products.Defends Against: Moth, Fall armyworm, Pod borer, Bollworms, Thrips, Aphids, Whiteflies

products.name: MASAL
products.description: MASAL is a dual-action insecticide containing Profenofos and Cypermethrin that delivers effective control against a wide range of pests. It is particularly effective against bollworms and sucking pests in cotton and various vegetable crops.
products.Defends Against: Bollworms, Aphids, Thrips, Caterpillars, Beetles, and Mites
products.Dose/Acre: 200 ml to 400 ml per acre, depending on the crop variety

products.name: KIWI
products.description: KIWI is a scientifically crafted organic plant growth enhancer made from Australian seaweed extract (Ascophyllum Nodosum), potassium humate, amino acids, and vital micronutrients. It supports robust vegetative growth, enhances immunity, improves flower and fruit retention, and ultimately boosts both yield and quality across all crop types.
products.Technical Name: Organic Component Derived From Ascophyllum Nodosum Seaweed Extract, Potassium Humate, Amino Acids & Micronutrients
products.Best Used In: Vegetables, Fruits, Cereals, Pulses, and Plantation Crops
products.Defends Against: Biotic and abiotic stress (like drought, disease, and poor soil conditions); helps reduce flower drop and improves overall plant vigor
products.Dose/Acre: 500–750 ml/acre; Foliar Spray – Vegetative Stage: 1–1.5 ml/litre, Flowering Stage: 2–3 ml/litre, Fruiting Stage: 3–4 ml/litre

products.name: FAISAL
products.description: FAISAL is a high-performance plant biostimulant derived from natural seaweed Ascophyllum nodosum extract. It promotes overall plant health and productivity by enhancing root and shoot development, improving nutrient uptake, and building resistance against environmental stress. Its organic formulation makes it safe for both crops and the environment, ideal for sustainable farming practices.
products.Technical Name: Based On Seaweed Ascophyllum nodosum extract
products.Best Used In: Field Crops (Wheat, Paddy, Cotton, Maize), Vegetables (Tomato, Chili, Brinjal, Okra), Fruits (Grapes, Banana, Mango, Citrus), Ornamental Plants (Nursery, Garden Plants, Lawns), Plantation Crops (Tea, Coffee, Sugarcane)
products.Defends Against: Drought stress, salinity stress, temperature stress; improves overall plant vigor and immunity
products.Dose/Acre: Foliar Spray: 2 ml / 1 Liter of water; Per Acre Application: 400 ml/acre
